definition: cassette tape/abbr. for 盒式錄音磁帶|盒式录音磁带/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Can you find a audio cassette player?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到一個盒帶錄音機嗎？

sentences.english: All radio programs are available on cassette format.
sentences.chinese: 所有的廣播節目都以盒帶形式發售。

sentences.english: His speech was taped on a cassette.
When play a VCR tape during a conference, do not use the mute button.
sentences.chinese: 在會議期間播放VCR盒帶，不要用消音鍵。
